Class FriendsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • FriendsManager

  • public class FriendsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Use case class that stores and removes the names of users to another user's friends list.
    Author:
    Tao

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FriendsManager(Registrar reg)
      Instantiates a FriendsManager object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addFriend(User user, java.lang.String username)
      Adds the the user with username "username" to "user"'s friends list
      boolean removeFriend(User user, java.lang.String username)
      Removes the the user with username "username" from "user"'s friends list

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FriendsManager

        public FriendsManager(Registrar reg)
        Instantiates a FriendsManager object
        Parameters:
        reg - an instance of registrar, which will be used to manage users

    • Method Detail

      • addFriend

        public boolean addFriend(User user,
                         java.lang.String username)
        Adds the the user with username "username" to "user"'s friends list
        Parameters:
        user - represents a user whose friends list will be modified
        username - represents the username who will be added to a friends list
        Returns:
        True or false.

      • removeFriend

        public boolean removeFriend(User user,
                            java.lang.String username)
        Removes the the user with username "username" from "user"'s friends list
        Parameters:
        user - represents a user whose friends list will be modified
        username - represents the username who will be removed from a friends list
        Returns:
        True or false.
